item.title: You Won't Believe How Many People Spell 'Coffee' Wrong!
item.description: You Won’t Believe How Many People Spell ‘Coffee’ Wrong! Coffee is one of the most popular beverages in the world. It’s no surprise then that it’s also one of the most commonly misspelled words. In fact, it’s estimated that up to 2 percent of people spell it incorrectly. Definition of Coffee Coffee is a brewed beverage made from roasted coffee beans. It is typically served hot and is a popular beverage choice for people all over the world.
